Package pl.rootpl

package pl.rootpl
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    DeleteRoot
    A JFrame class for deleting a root.
    GetVerses
    A class for displaying verses associated with a root ID.
    RootPL
    The RootPL class represents the graphical user interface for managing roots.
    UpdateRoot
    The UpdateRoot class represents the graphical user interface for updating a root.
    VersesByPoem
    The VersesByPoem class represents a graphical user interface for displaying verses associated with a specific poem.
    ViewRoots
    The ViewRoots class represents a graphical user interface for displaying all roots with their statuses.
